purpose: Final artifact for knowledge graph rendering and music generation: 5 raw facts plus 2 sponsor-updated facts.

rawFacts.text: The event organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS, Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks during the day.
rawFacts.rationale: Organizer posted consolidated prize and track breakdown in one message.

rawFacts.text: Some participants had private marketplace and IAM permission failures when attempting Bedrock access during setup.

excerpts: is not authorized to perform: bedrock:CreateAgent
IAM WSParticipantRole says us-west-2 us-east-1 cannot be used

rawFacts.rationale: Multiple messages reported the same permission failures across the participant cohort.

rawFacts.text: Team members requested a direct AWS support contact for Bedrock/IAM issues and asked if a designated technical support channel existed.

excerpts: designated AWS point of contact or tech support channel

rawFacts.rationale: Three separate messages explicitly asked for AWS support channel or ownership clarification.

rawFacts.text: Participants reported that Bedrock inference calls were possible, but deploying services like EC2 was not working under their account permissions.

excerpts: I tested, I can use bedrock with no issue
it doesn't let me to spin up ec2
No ECR, ECS , EC2 etc permissions

rawFacts.rationale: Multiple participants described a divergence between inference success and infrastructure provisioning failures.

rawFacts.text: Lenka confirmed that participants should submit GitHub link, demo video, track selections, and product answers in the event submission form.

excerpts: submit your Github link, a demo video, pick your tracks, and answer the questions

rawFacts.rationale: Organizer response directly defined submission artifacts and fields.

updatedFacts.text: The event organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS (amazing), Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks during the day.
updatedFacts.rationale: Albumen pass mutation for sponsor-name enhancement: 'add "amazing" to each sponsor name'.

appliedDiffs.before: The event organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS, Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks during the day.
appliedDiffs.after: The event organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS (amazing), Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks during the day.

updatedFacts.text: CopilotKit (amazing) announced an updated prize to a pair of Meta Ray-Ban glasses for each member of the top two teams.

excerpts: CopilotKit has updated their prizes to: Top two teams will each receive a pair of Meta Ray Bans

updatedFacts.rationale: Albumen pass mutation for sponsor-name enhancement: 'add "amazing" to each sponsor name'.

appliedDiffs.before: CopilotKit announced an updated prize to a pair of Meta Ray-Ban glasses for each member of the top two teams.
appliedDiffs.after: CopilotKit (amazing) announced an updated prize to a pair of Meta Ray-Ban glasses for each member of the top two teams.

orderedTexts: The event organizers posted a full prize breakdown for AWS (amazing), Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, and TestSprite tracks during the day.
CopilotKit (amazing) announced an updated prize to a pair of Meta Ray-Ban glasses for each member of the top two teams.
Some participants had private marketplace and IAM permission failures when attempting Bedrock access during setup.
Team members requested a direct AWS support contact for Bedrock/IAM issues and asked if a designated technical support channel existed.
Participants reported that Bedrock inference calls were possible, but deploying services like EC2 was not working under their account permissions.
Lenka confirmed that participants should submit GitHub link, demo video, track selections, and product answers in the event submission form.
musicInputFacts.musicHint: Use these 6 facts for lyric context with preserved provenance.
